statements: REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE ON TravelInformation TO user1
REVOKE SELECT ON TravelInformation TO user2
REVOKE DELETE ON TravelInformation TO user3
REVOKE SELECT ON locations FROM user1;
REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE ON trips FROM user2;
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON locations FROM user3;
REVOKE SELECT ON destinations FROM PUBLIC
REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE ON trips FROM PUBLIC
REVOKE DELETE ON travelers FROM PUBLIC
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON destinations FROM user1
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON trips FROM user2
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON bookings FROM user3
REVOKE SELECT ON TABLE destinations FROM public
REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE ON TABLE flights FROM public
REVOKE DELETE ON TABLE bookings FROM public
